meanings.definition: Not speaking or uttering a sound.
meanings.sent1: The unspeaking cat quietly watched the birds outside.
meanings.sent2: The library was unspeaking, filled with the hush of books.
meanings.sent3: The unspeaking clock seemed to be enjoying the peace and quiet.
meanings.sent4: The unspeaking forest held its breath as the storm approached.
meanings.sent5: The unspeaking night enveloped the city in a blanket of darkness.

meanings.sent1: The unspeaking child nodded in agreement.
meanings.sent2: The unspeaking snowfall covered the town in a soft white blanket.
meanings.sent3: The unspeaking mime entertained the crowd with gestures and expressions.
meanings.sent4: The unspeaking stars twinkled in the night sky above.
meanings.sent5: The unspeaking stone statue stood stoically in the park.

meanings.definition: Lacking the ability to speak or communicate verbally.
meanings.sent1: The unspeaking toddler pointed at the toy she wanted.
meanings.sent2: The unspeaking robot beeped and whirred as it moved around the room.
meanings.sent3: The unspeaking phone refused to make any calls that day.
meanings.sent4: The unspeaking painting seemed to convey a thousand emotions.
meanings.sent5: The unspeaking ghost floated through the old mansion, trying to communicate silently.
